Package net.sf.jstuff.core.compression

Class GZipCompression

java.lang.Object
net.sf.jstuff.core.compression.AbstractCompression
net.sf.jstuff.core.compression.GZipCompression
All Implemented Interfaces:
Compression
public class GZipCompression extends AbstractCompression
Compress/decompress using "gzip" compression format. GZip is deflate plus CRC32 checksum
Author:
Sebastian Thomschke
